thread.title: Men’s Soccer Prepares for Ranked Friday Matchup – UK Athletics
thread.title_full: Men’s Soccer Prepares for Ranked Friday Matchup – UK Athletics

title: Men’s Soccer Prepares for Ranked Friday Matchup – UK Athletics
text: Men’s Soccer Prepares for Ranked Friday Matchup LEXINGTON, Ky. – No. 16 Kentucky men’s soccer (1-0-1) is set to host No. 10 Wisconsin (4-0) on Friday for a 7:30 p.m. EST matchup at The Bell Soccer Complex. The Wildcats enter the contest following a 2-2 draw against Virginia Tech on Monday evening while the Badgers travel to Lexington after notching a 2-1 win over RV Marquette. The match will mark the second time in series history the two programs have faced off on the pitch. UK and UW last went head-to-head in Madison, Wis. in 2023 which resulted in a 1-0 Badger win. Kentucky has recorded five different goal scorers so far in the 2024 match slate in Isaiah Chisolm, Logan Dorsey, Oliver Stavdal, Agustin Lopez and Nick Zielonka. UK currently sits tied for second in the Sun Belt Conference standings with Georgia Southern. Friday’s match promotion will be Youth Day which will feature a rally towel giveaway and inflatables set up in the concourse. Big Blue Nation can purchase single match, group, and season tickets by [clicking here](https://ukathletics.com/ticketing/soccer/). Tickets will also be available for purchase upon arrival to The Bell. Gates will open one hour prior to kick-off. Live stats will be available for the match against the Badgers by [clicking here](https://www.statbroadcast.com/events/statmonitr.php?gid=kty). Fans can also stream the contest live on [ESPN+.](https://www.espn.com/watch/player/_/id/341fcb84-5ce9-44cc-9f39-82d5d3a2d3e0) For the latest on Kentucky Men’s Soccer, follow @UKMensSoccer on X (formerly Twitter), Facebook and Instagram, as well as on the web at UKAthletics.com. Related Stories [View all](https://ukathletics.com/sports/all/news/)
